text: Amazon is a 1997 American short documentary film directed by Kieth Merrill. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.VHS 1998 Oscars- Internet Archive The film features ethnobiologist Mark Plotkin, who discusses the role of rainforest conservation and the benefits of investigating it further in the interest of medical and scientific knowledge.Imax Takes a Semi- Contrived Trek to the Amazon-LA TIMESIMAX'S `AMAZON' CAPTURES THE FOREST.-Free Online Library ==References== ==External links== * *Rotten Tomatoes *IMAX Category:1997 films Category:1997 documentary films Category:American films Category:American independent films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Kieth Merrill Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about nature Category:Amazon River Category:MacGillivray Freeman Films films
